caption: DHCP Activity
description: DHCP Activity events report MAC to IP assignment via DHCP from a client or server.
name: dhcp_activity

5.caption: Ack
5.description: DHCPACK: The server accepts the request by sending the client a DHCP Acknowledgment message.

7.caption: Release
7.description: DHCPRELEASE: A DHCP client sends a DHCPRELEASE packet to the server to release the IP address and cancel any remaining lease.

dst_endpoint.description: The responder (server) of the DHCP connection.

src_endpoint.description: The initiator (client) of the DHCP connection.

transaction_uid.description: The unique identifier of the transaction. This is typically a random number generated from the client to associate a dhcp request/response pair.
